TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit KnownAce extends System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce

Docs.summary: Encapsulates all Access Control Entry (ACE) types currently defined by Microsoft Corporation. All KnownAce objects contain a 32-bit access mask and a <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> object.
Gets or sets the access mask for this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.KnownAce"> object.
Docs.value: The access mask for this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.KnownAce"> object.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> object associated with this <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.KnownAce> object.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> object associated with this <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.KnownAce> object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks No restrictions are placed on the <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> object.
